name: Fighting Angels
storyline: More Simple Series babes are featured in this fighting game. Select from ten Cat Fighters and battle one-on-one using sexy moves. Power up your sexy gauge to make use of your super sexy specials. Included in the game are tournament, survival, practice and death match modes along with a view mode that allows you view the girls from close up.
summary: Simplistic 3D versus fighter with all-female cast and an emphasis on breast physics. Released only in Europe and in Japan as Simple 2000 Series Vol. 55: The Catfight: Joneko Densetsu.
